name: Sentry Ward
lore: A form of plant originally grown in the garden of a fearful king.

descriptions.name: Plant
descriptions.description: Plants a Sentry Ward, an invisible watcher that grants True Sight, the ability to see invisible enemy units and wards, to any existing allied vision within a 850 radius.Duration: 4 minutes.Does not grant ground vision.Hold Control to give one Sentry Ward to an allied hero.Range: 500
